product_overview: Consently is an enterprise-grade SaaS platform that enables Indian businesses to achieve seamless compliance with the Digital Personal Data Protection Act (DPDPA) 2023. It provides automated consent and cookie management, detailed compliance reporting, multi-language support, and privacy-first features, helping organizations efficiently manage user data privacy and consent obligations.
core_goals: Enable rapid DPDPA 2023 compliance setup for Indian businesses
Reduce compliance costs significantly through automation
Ensure privacy-first approach with zero PII collection in consent management
Provide multi-language support for India’s diverse user base
Offer comprehensive analytics and audit trails for compliance verification
Deliver user-friendly interfaces for both admins and end-users
Support cross-device consent synchronization using unique Consent IDs
key_features: User Authentication with email/password and OAuth and onboarding wizard
Automated cookie scanning with classification and customizable consent banners
DPDPA consent management with processing activities, widget configurations, and granular consent collection
Consent ID generation and verification for cross-device preference syncing
Analytics dashboard with real-time consent trends, device and geographic breakdowns
Complete audit trail with detailed consent history and compliance reports
User-facing Privacy Centre for consent management and data subject rights requests
Settings including profile, security (2FA), and subscription billing integrated with Razorpay
Multi-language support across 22 Indian languages with translation services
Pre-built industry-specific consent templates to speed up compliance setup
user_flow_summary: User Registration: Landing Page → Sign Up → Email Verification → Onboarding Wizard → Dashboard
User Login: Landing Page → Login → Authentication → Dashboard
Cookie Scanning: Dashboard → Cookies → Scan Website → Review and Edit Results → Save
Cookie Banner Customization: Dashboard → Cookies → Customize Banner → Preview → Deploy Widget
Cookie Consent Collection (End User): Website Visit → Banner Display → User Consent → Consent Recorded
DPDPA Processing Activities Setup: Dashboard → DPDPA → Activities → Industry Templates → Selection and Saving
DPDPA Widget Configuration: Dashboard → DPDPA → Widget → Configuration → Code Generation and Embedding
DPDPA Consent Collection (End User): Website Visit → Consent Notice → Activity Review → Consent Given → Consent ID Issued
Consent ID Verification: New Device → Enter Consent ID → Verification → Preferences Loaded
Analytics Viewing: Dashboard → Reports → View and Filter Data → Export Reports
Audit Trail Viewing: Dashboard → Audit → Search Records → Generate Export Reports
Privacy Centre Access: Website → Privacy Centre → Manage Consent and Submit Rights Requests
User Settings Management: Dashboard → Settings → Profile/Security/Billing → Update and Save
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and login with email verification and OAuth support
Accurate cookie scanning with classification exceeding 95% accuracy
Customizable cookie banners with proper preview and widget generation
Granular consent collection and storage with unique Consent ID generation and validation
Consent ID verification flow working across devices with error handling
Accurate consent analytics with filtering and export capabilities
Complete audit trail and compliance reports exportable in multiple formats
Privacy centre functionality allowing consent management and data rights requests
Security measures including 2FA, RLS policies, encryption, and session management enforced
Subscription payments processed successfully via Razorpay with invoice generation
Performance metrics met: API response times below 500ms, widget load under 1 second, consent collection under 15 minutes
Accessibility and localization support with WCAG 2.1 AA compliance and 22 Indian languages
